summary: Modifies artifacts (weapons and armor) to have the properties they should. Daedric artifacts have daedric stats and so on.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]I wasn't satisfied with the available artifact mods so I made my own. No staves, non-weapon/armor items, or leveled artifacts like Dragonbane or Pale Blade are included. Everything you need to know is in the image.

Requires Dawnguard
Install normally with a mod manager. Use the WAFR version if you use that mod.

My mods
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71414]Inncreased Food[/url][/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70096]Nzhuz - Field Lab[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68552]Recolored Edwarr's spell tomes[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65953]Holy Wards - a retexture[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73249]Bunny Artifact Tweaks[/url][/size]

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68455][size=2]Rare Daedric and Dragon Gear[/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62418][size=2]Alterion Wards - Alteration wards[/size][/url]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63626]Reasonable Pelt Prices[/url][/size]
[/list][/size][/font]
author: BanjoBunny
